name: site-stitcher
description: The tool I use to build my website, picostitch.com

scripts.ci:test: npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev:start: npm run build --silent && (npm run serve & ./run-on-file-change.sh npm run build:sites --silent)
scripts.build: npm run build:sites && npm run build:assets && touch _output/.nojekyll
scripts.build:assets: cp CNAME _output && npm run build:css && npm run build:favicon && npm run build:images:png && npm run build:images:jpg && npm run build:images:gif  && npm run build:images:webp && npm run build:images:gif-tidbits && npm run build:images:jpg-tidbits && npm run build:images:png-tidbits && npm run build:images:webp-tidbits
scripts.build:css: cp templates/*.css _output/ && cp templates/tidbit/*.css _output/tidbits/ && cp templates/blog/*.css _output/blog/ && cp templates/about/*.css _output/about/ && cp templates/projects/*.css _output/projects/

author: Wolfram Kriesing
